analysis.key_quote: I unequivocally oppose the implementation—or any effort toward the reinstatement—of the “Schedule F” classification within the federal civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, citing concerns about its threat to the merit-based system and due process protections for federal employees. It emphasizes the risks of politicization and arbitrary dismissals, aligning with themes that inherently oppose the proposed rule.
